DOC.detailed_description: During study whenever arm volume measurement use Perometer , also measure fluid arm use Bioimpedance Spectroscopy . These measurement make pass harmless electrical signal low strength body determine difference amount fluid arm . The test simple painless , take 3 minute . In addition , whenever arm measurement , ask complete questionnaire . While complete questionnaire , skip question wish answer . The questionnaire take 10 minute complete . Arm measurement Perometer Bioimpedance Spectroscopy completion questionnaire occur every 4-7 month MGH regular medical visit .
